title: Best of The Program | Guest: Rob Eno | 12/7/20
description:
Sports Illustrated makes “the activist athlete” its person of the year. Has anyone watched actual TV any time recently? Michigan restaurant owner Dave Morris let a live news broadcast know how frustrated he is with coronavirus lockdowns, and he isn’t going down without a fight. The Left’s message is to shut up and take it, but that’s not what Americans do. BlazeTV media critic Rob Eno discusses the downfall of the Drudge Report and how net neutrality pushes could return after FCC chairman Ajit Pai steps down on Inauguration Day.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
